nodes.text: The Baath brothers were the owners of the Outlander Club, located on Coruscant. They had ties to Mayor Acros-Krik and even small business owners such as Nar Hida; most who knew the brothers characterized them as "dangerous".
Magaloof, a small-time Leffingite crook working for the crime boss Hat Lo, hoped to join up with the Baath brothers.
